info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 28 at 1:20PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM MST FOR CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 120 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blake Ranch Road, or 15 miles east of Kingman, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Wild Cow Campground, Dw Ranch Road, Blake Ranch Road, Hualapai Mountain Park and Hualapai Peak. This includes Interstate 40 in Arizona between mile markers 60 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
